description: MEMORANDUM AND ORDER granting 29 Motion for Summary Judgment; denying 48 Motion for Summary Judgment; granting 53 Motion for Summary Judgment; denying 18 Motion for Summary Judgment. IT IS HEREBY ORDERED that:(1)The Motion for Summary Judgment by Defendants Robert K. Mericle and Mericle Construction, Inc. (Doc. 18) is DENIED.(2) The Cross-Motion for Summary Judgment by Plaintiff Travelers Property Casualty Company of America (Doc. 29) is GRANTED. (3)The Motion for Summary Judgment on Defendants Amended Counter Claim filed by Defendants (Doc. 48) is DENIED. (4)The Motion for Summary Judgment on Defendants Amended Counter Claim filed by Plaintiff (Doc. 53) is GRANTED.(5)JUDGMENT IS ENTERED in favor of Plaintiff.(6)The Clerk of Court shall mark this case as CLOSED. Signed by Honorable A. Richard Caputo on 8/31/10 (jam, ) (Entered: 08/31/2010)
